title: Badlands National Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Check out lesson plans that bring Badlands National Park into your classroom. Teachers preparing for a video conference, field trip, or guest speaker will find suggested previsit lesson plans on different topics.  All Curriculum Materials   Featured Lesson    Bison Banquet Learn More     Guest Speakers Schools within 80 miles of Interior, SD can request a classroom ranger visit. Learn more about program offerings and review lesson content and other suggested teaching materials.  All Guest Speakers   Featured Program    Prairie Animals and Habitats Learn More     Online Galleries Learn more about the additional online resources Badlands National Park has to offer. All Online Galleries   Featured Online Resource    Badlands Education Twitter Feed Learn More     Field Trips Information on the various ranger- and self-guided field trips available at Badlands National Park. All Field Trips   Featured Field Trip    Self-guided Field Trips Learn More
